actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to allow United States exporters to export agricultural commodities to Cuba in certain situations.

summary.text: Allows U.S. exporters to export agricultural commodities and products to Cuba if: (1) such commodities or products are available to Cuba from foreign exporters; and (2) such commodities or products are sold to Cuba at fair market value in exchange for cash or other goods without the assistance of Government credit.

titles.title: A bill to allow United States exporters to export agricultural commodities to Cuba in certain situations.
